channel.title: Hybrid pvp v3 server auto message help
channel.description: im using hybrid pvp v3 source and im trying to add an auto message that says "plz donate at honakerscape.webs.com" like every 500 seconds

item.title: Hybrid pvp v3 server auto message help

item.title: Hybrid pvp v3 server auto message help
item.dc:creator: @Javerfire Javerfire
item.description:
@Javerfire wrote:

[quote=“Get Blitz, post:7, topic:409143”][quote author=Javerfire link=topic=510425.msg3704565#msg3704565 date=1312944692]
you will need zfilesearcher.jar
open it and type in the exact keywords “honakerscape.webs.com”
whatever file it is located in then go ahead and open it.
Finally use ctrl+f to find the keywords “honakerscape.webs.com” and edit those or remove the entire message.
[/quote]

If you read properly he said he wants to make it say that… Which means its not there.[/quote]
my bad :o

Read full topic

item.title: Hybrid pvp v3 server auto message help
item.dc:creator: @Javerfire Javerfire
item.description:
@Javerfire wrote:

you will need zfilesearcher.jar
open it and type in the exact keywords “honakerscape.webs.com”
whatever file it is located in then go ahead and open it.
Finally use ctrl+f to find the keywords “honakerscape.webs.com” and edit those or remove the entire message.

Read full topic

item.title: Hybrid pvp v3 server auto message help
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

client.java and add this void:

public void mymessage() {
        EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
            public void execute(EventContainer c) {
                sendMessage("[@red@SERVER NOTICE@bla@]: Your Message or whatever here");
            }
        }, 100000); //Time it takes to send the message 
    };

And after you add that code, find

public void initialize() {
And under that add:

mymessage();

Read full topic
